title: [Client] Viewing new poppy bundle make you buy it
body:
DO NOT CLICK ON UNLOCK to view what are the items in the bundle. It automacally buy it for you (unlike other bundles). I got stuck with this bundle when try to viewing it. Since bundle are not refundable, it make the sales final.
Just want to warn everybody so poeple are not stuck like me with a bundle that they do not really want. :(
I put a copy of it in the general discussion to warn everybody since no one really view the bug section of the boards

replies.body: Well think it was not working properly 2 hours ago. It only display  thanks for the purchase when I click it instead of showing me stuff in the bundle (when clicking on the first unlock button). Can verify you with Windows 7?

Hey letour19,

This is working as intended. The 'unlock' button is confirmation that you'd like to purchase the content. The images on the store card indicate the content that's inside. You can also check the [promotional pages](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-update/poppy-heroically-charges-live) for more detailed content information.  Sorry about the confusion here!

I believe that he means the first unlock button.  If you go to Store > Bundles in the client, every bundle item has a button to bring up an over view window with the contents which also has an Unlock button.  This unlock should not purchase.
Correct, there are two unlock buttons. I verified that both unlock features are working properly.
